comment: All employees can raise hardware issues.
All employees can raise software issues.
All employees can raise network issues.
Interns require manager approval for any access request.
Junior engineers need approval for certain access requests.
Finance-related access requires finance manager approval.
Finance analysts must get approval for folder/app access.
Senior finance analysts can request standard finance access.
Sales executives may request standard sales tools access.
Sales managers allowed for most access.
Junior engineers cannot request admin rights.
Engineering interns cannot request admin or elevated access.
HR-related access requires HR manager approval.
IT support staff allowed for internal system access.
Off-scope requests cannot be handled by IT.
Ambiguous requests allowed but must seek clarification.
General policy questions allowed for all employees.
